title: Grant-Kohrs Ranch National Historic Site: Pets
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Pets              Pets       Safety is a concern not only for our visitors, but also for their four-legged friends. Leashed dogs are allowed in the parking lot in front of the visitors center, as well as other designated areas of the ranch, however, dogs are not permitted in the area surrounding the ranch house and other historic buildings.  Open-air kennels are also offered, free of charge, to those visitors with animals traveling with them.  For a comprehensive map and more information about the kennels, please visit the Visitor Center upon your arrival to the ranch.
